1370: Marie was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Engelbertus at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Vroeden in 1370 at age 17.
1371: Gave birth to Mette in 1371 at age 18.
1372: Lost daughter Mette when Mette was 2 years old.
1373: Gave birth to Natelien in 1373 at age 20.
1376: Gave birth to Duker in 1376 at age 23.
1377: Gave birth to Rembrandus in 1377 at age 24.
1379: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1379 at age 26.
Lost daughter Emgelberna when Emgelberna was 1 years old.
1382: Gave birth to Truden in 1382 at age 29.
1383: Gave birth to Clementia in 1383 at age 30.
